website_summaries.verdict: A highly affordable set. Offers fun, imaginative play time and is compact and suitable for travel.
pros: The truck is full of details like lights, a hose, and the cab design
Two firefighters in full gear and a fire make this a fun action set that will keep LEGO builders entertained for hours
cons: A few complaints of sets arriving without all the pieces

customer_reviews.title: A great set!
customer_reviews.text: i was big into legos as a kid, and my two year old plays with deploys all day. He also loves fire trucks, so I figured this might be fun. I putt this together while he was sleeping, and he's had lots of fun playing with the firefighters and the truck. The design is really clever, and the set is beautifully detailed. My only complaint was a minor one, and at this price point, wasn't worth deducting a star, but the stickers are really tough to put on accurately. Printed bricks would be much easier, but I suspect that would make the set much more expensive.
customer_reviews.author: Gary Labelle

customer_reviews.title: Don’t tell your 4 year old about the droplet shooter. You’ll be glad.
customer_reviews.text: He loves it. In hindsight I recommend NOT showing the water droplet shooting feature to your small child unless you think they are definitely old enough to put the little bead on by themselves. Unless you like getting up at five am to put the bead in the shooter over and over until you make the beads “get lost”. Other than that: awesome toy!
customer_reviews.author: Ben Pershouse

customer_reviews.title: My 6 year old loves this. I bought this ...
customer_reviews.text: My 6 year old loves this. I bought this along with the LEGO CITY firestation because for I was thinking the firestation was only the fire station. I decided to keep it as a second fire truck so there was no fighting when he played with his sister or friends, Once we started putting everything together I realized it is a different truck then what came in in firestation set.
customer_reviews.author: Connie S Herring

customer_reviews.title: Absolutely Worth The Money!
customer_reviews.text: This is the best choice for the money. It is great quality and Amazon is cheaper than Wal-Mart! My son got this for his birthday in Sept. and he has played with it over and over again. I have to say that some of the Lego sets are hard to keep together but when this one hits the floor most of it stays together, so when my son brings it to me to fix I can just place a few pieces and I am done. One of the cheaper sets and is everything I hoped it would be.
customer_reviews.author: Taylor Youngblood

customer_reviews.title: Fun to create together!
customer_reviews.text: Ordered for my 5 yr old to assemble with help. He just started doing lego kits and loved this one. Took about 1 hour to assemble with adult help and pieces have stayed together well after. Easy to follow instructions. Was missing one small white piece but it wasn't critical to the build. Will be ordering more. It does come with small accessory pieces so be careful with younger siblings- choking hazard.
customer_reviews.author: Laurel

customer_reviews.title: Firetruck plus toddler is a win
customer_reviews.text: My 2 year-old got into Legos way earlier than we thought he would. This is likely due to his older cousins. In any case, there were a few tiny pieces that we hid such as the face masks for the Lego men, and he needs help putting it together. When he's a year or two older we'll give the tiny pieces back and I'm sure he'll be able to put it together on his own. For now it's great bonding time with him and Dad.
customer_reviews.author: hopex5

customer_reviews.title: Moveable fire engine with figurines
customer_reviews.text: Perfect addition to the Lego City collection. As usual, the instructions were easy to follow and results in a very cool fire engine and figures. My daughter likes to build them as intended, play with it for awhile, and then let's her imagination take over as she breaks pieces apart and rebuilds into new things. The options are as endless as her imagination.
customer_reviews.author: MN MOM

customer_reviews.title: great. Bottom portion feels nearly identical to building the ...
customer_reviews.text: It works. I wish the part that let's you coil the "water hose" was easier for young children to twist. I find my kids just leaving it half coiled. It might as well not could and just have a short hose. Besides that, great. Bottom portion feels nearly identical to building the Lego Friends ambulance, except with different colors. The top portion is what makes the difference.
customer_reviews.author: W

customer_reviews.title: A great toy for youngsters!
customer_reviews.text: Our grandson loved it the moment he opened it up at his birthday party. As soon as the cake was eaten he and his dad went to work. Great product for young kids who love fire houses, trucks and all that goes with a fire department.
customer_reviews.author: Kentucky Jack

customer_reviews.title: Adult assembly required
customer_reviews.text: Good attention to detail. My grandson was mesmerized. He was disappointed the firefighters didn't fit in the cab, but creatively found a way that they could. There is a door on one side that doesn't fit open without falling off. My grandson found that very frustrating.
customer_reviews.author: MrkS

customer_reviews.title: My grandson’s favorite toy
customer_reviews.text: This fire engine is my 4-year-old grandson’s favorite toy. He plays with it every time he visits. The LEGO quality is great. The truck holds together as he plays with it. Sometimes he needs help taking the top off the cab to get the firefighters in and out.
customer_reviews.author: Sally GY

customer_reviews.title: Great fire truck set
customer_reviews.text: My children are so into LEGO that they would like any set at any time. This one is definitely a great set for boys, because they love fire trucks. The price is OK. LEGO is not cheep anywhere, so Amazon has the best pricing by far. Arrived promptly.
customer_reviews.author: Mommy3

customer_reviews.title: Just what I ordered
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this as a Christmas gift for my grandson. It appears to be pretty expensive considering the little box of Legos that I received. This is what his parents wanted for him so I bought it.
customer_reviews.author: dht

customer_reviews.title: Firetruck!!!
customer_reviews.text: Got this for my son as he loves fire trucks. He was super excited. He's only 3 so we worked on it together. Great bonding time. Now he likes taking parts off and putting them back other places. The fire hose and wench are the only poor component. Very difficult for an adult to operate. Recommend to anyone growing Lego collection.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: LEGO's great vehicle and you just have to buy the one's on sale
customer_reviews.text: Awesome vehicle for a discounted price compared to LEGO store or Toys R Us. I always look for 15% to 20% discounts and compare to the physical LEGO store which is only few miles away. The discounted prices pretty much match the in-store red price stickers. As for the package, they are LEGO so they are awesome. My kid has been blessed and spoiled.
customer_reviews.author: neophyte226

customer_reviews.title: FAKE item
customer_reviews.text: This is a fake Lego. Don't buy it. The box doesn't have the information on the amount of the details in the set and the description of what is inside the box - it is supposed to be a fire truck. I am shocked that Amazon allows sellers to sell fake items. I can provide pictures if needed.
customer_reviews.author: Sasha

customer_reviews.title: Grandkids love it and so do I
customer_reviews.text: What can I say, Lego's are Lego's and the grandkids love them all bought it especially for our grandson. Our son is a firefighter
customer_reviews.author: Dave

customer_reviews.title: What kid doesn't love a fire truck?
customer_reviews.text: The 4 year old was thrilled with this Lego City Fire Ladder Truck. It offered imaginative play with the figures and the ladder. A good stepping place for kids who may have been using more of the bigger Legos to switch to the regular size pieces.
customer_reviews.author: Sunny

customer_reviews.title: Great lego set for kids
customer_reviews.text: My son loves legos and is getting into the sets more than just building randomly. This was a great set that he was able to put together with some help from us.
customer_reviews.author: skydivegirl24

customer_reviews.title: Consider age of child
customer_reviews.text: Definitely for an older child. My grandson's dad helped him put it together. Of course, it came apart in normal play. This was a lesson for the child. Not sure he learned it though. I would say at least eight years old.
customer_reviews.author: Sharane Wiedenhoeft

customer_reviews.title: Great toy with good building directions
customer_reviews.text: Super nice fire truck that was an easy build for my 7 year old to do almost completely on his won. It works well, is nice, and directions are well written too.
customer_reviews.author: Melissa Odom

customer_reviews.title: Ordered it twice !
customer_reviews.text: My son loves fire trucks!!! This was easy to put together with my 3.5 year old, and he was so excited throughout the whole time! Love it so much ordered another one for his friend's birthday !
customer_reviews.author: Anabanan

customer_reviews.title: A great set!
customer_reviews.text: This was a great set for my 5 and 8 year old to put together with teamwork. Some parts were harder for my 5 year old but is older brother was able to finish it. One of the less expensive Lego sets.
customer_reviews.author: Prime Momma

customer_reviews.title: Why are legos so expensive
customer_reviews.text: Legos are way over priced but it's a nice set if you dont mind the price tag
customer_reviews.author: Nicholas bowler

customer_reviews.title: Extra special.
customer_reviews.text: Extra special. excellent item for even a four-year-old with a little help. Absolutely thrilled with quality.
customer_reviews.author: S. Mahoney

customer_reviews.title: Medium skill level
customer_reviews.text: We bought this LEGO set for a LEGO club at school. Our club is for 6-10 year olds. All of our ages were able to successfully build the firetuck in a 20-30 minute period. It is a lot of fun to play with after it is built!
customer_reviews.author: Ryan G.

customer_reviews.title: GRANDSON LOVED IT...DADDY TOO!
customer_reviews.text: My son and grandson had a big time putting this together. Actually, we ALL had a turn...kept us busy, (especially the kids) for hours. Great gift for my 5 year old grandson.
customer_reviews.author: Angel Dog

customer_reviews.title: all pieces there and went together perfectly like every other lego product I've ever had
customer_reviews.text: Arrived on time, all pieces there and went together perfectly like every other lego product I've ever had. Just can't complain about lego brand stuff.
customer_reviews.author: Brandon A.

customer_reviews.title: Awesome
customer_reviews.text: This might be my favorite Lego set I've gotten my boys.
customer_reviews.author: JuniorsMa

customer_reviews.title: Missing pieces
customer_reviews.text: This is a great product however, after assembling, we realized it was missing around 4 pieces. It obviously still makes the fire truck but it’s frustrating looking for pieces that aren’t there when trying to put together.
customer_reviews.author: Brooke

customer_reviews.title: Great fun set
customer_reviews.text: Great set! My 4 year old loved it and built it all by himself!
customer_reviews.author: txshoppergirl

customer_reviews.title: He loves it!
customer_reviews.text: My son loves Lego city and Legos in general just like his daddy! This is a neat fire truck set and he loves playing with it. The price wasn't bad either.
customer_reviews.author: Cameron S

customer_reviews.title: Excellent gift!
customer_reviews.text: This was a great gift for a 6yr old. It was complicated enough to keep him entertained, but not so challenging that he was not able to assemble it without any assistance. I feel that Legos are educational as well as entertaining.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Not worth the price
customer_reviews.text: It's ok but not worth the price. Forced to buy it due to kids.
customer_reviews.author: J. Ji

customer_reviews.title: plastic realism quantized in pocket size.
customer_reviews.text: I feel like some of these models are getting so good, they lose the "Lego" feel. they look amazing and the pricing on Amazon is tremendous. My son and I love building together.
customer_reviews.author: Maddox #1 fan

customer_reviews.title: Can't go wrong with Legos
customer_reviews.text: Sent it to our nephew for Christmas. Fire truck/Lego/boy... perfect combination.
customer_reviews.author: Jason C Dawson

customer_reviews.title: Great quality/lots of cute details!
customer_reviews.text: This is a really cute set with lots of little details. My 5 yr old put it together by himself and takes it everywhere. Highly recommend for the price!!
customer_reviews.author: M. Hogan

customer_reviews.title: It is a Lego
customer_reviews.text: Great gift item. We gave this to our grandson and he loves it

customer_reviews.title: Great gift!
customer_reviews.text: For 6 year old grandson as Christmas gift. He loves Legos!

customer_reviews.title: Expensive but good
customer_reviews.text: A little expensive for what it is but my niece loves it! Very easy to assemble for her at 4.5.

customer_reviews.title: Great choice!
customer_reviews.text: It went together perfectly as with all legos! Kids love the movable extension ladder!

customer_reviews.title: Best Gift for Young and Old
customer_reviews.text: It's LEGO, what do you expect? Of course it is the best gift for anyone old or young.
customer_reviews.author: P. Kong

customer_reviews.title: Recommended for ages 5-12
customer_reviews.text: The item came quickly and in perfect shape. I thought it was a little high at $30+ but it was what I needed for a perfect birthday gift. It was worth the money!
customer_reviews.author: Shari

customer_reviews.title: Great set at a great price point
customer_reviews.text: A great small vehicle kit, and a great value. One of the most attractive of these smaller vehicles. A fun build with lots of play value for kids.

customer_reviews.title: Great set for my nephew
customer_reviews.text: Purchased this for my nephew's birthday. Good sized Lego set. I was afraid that it was going to be small and look cheap but it wasn't. He loves it!

customer_reviews.text: I LOVE LEGOS! This was a fun set to build. I liked how they included pieces to look like hydraulic rams to move the ladder.

customer_reviews.title: Good, but could use a better ladder
customer_reviews.text: My 4 year old put most of this together on his own, with minimal help from dad. He enjoys playing with it, but the ladder frequently comes off, even when not in use.

customer_reviews.text: One of the best small LEGO sets! My 3 year old son loves this set and it was a big hit for Christmas!

product_meta.title: LEGO City Fire Ladder Truck 60107
product_meta.description:
Be a hero in LEGO City with the Fire Ladder Truck, featuring an extending ladder that spins 360 degrees and a pull-out fire hose with a special stud-shooter function to knock down the flames. This cool toy for kids includes 2 minifigures: a female firefighter and a male firefighter.

BRAND STORY
By LEGO
feature_bullets: Build a fire truck featuring an extending ladder that spins 360 degrees and a pull-out fire hose with stud-shooter function!
Includes a female firefighter and a male firefighter.Move the Fire Ladder Truck into position, extend the ladder and get above the fire
LEGO City building toys are compatible with all LEGO construction sets for creative building
Fire Ladder Truck measures over 3” high, 7” long and 1” wide
214 pieces – For boys and girls between the ages of 5 and 12

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.8 out of 5 stars857 ratings4.8 out of 5 stars
